statements: SELECT * FROM virtual_networks WHERE name = 'CorpNet'
SELECT id, cidr_block FROM virtual_networks WHERE provider = 'Azure'
SELECT name, created_at FROM virtual_networks ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM virtual_networks WHERE provider = 'AWS' ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT id, name, cidr_block FROM virtual_networks WHERE cidr_block LIKE '%.0/24'
SELECT name, cidr_block, provider FROM virtual_networks WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM virtual_networks WHERE provider IS NOT NULL ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, name, created_at FROM virtual_networks WHERE provider = 'Azure' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_networks FROM virtual_networks;
SELECT id, name, cidr_block, provider, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS creation_date FROM virtual_networks WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM virtual_networks;
SELECT name, cidr FROM virtual_networks WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, name, cidr FROM virtual_networks ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM subnets WHERE network_id = 1;
SELECT id, name FROM subnets WHERE cidr LIKE '%.0' ORDER BY name;
SELECT * FROM virtual_networks WHERE cidr LIKE '192.%';
SELECT id, name FROM subnets WHERE network_id = 1 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, cidr FROM virtual_networks WHERE name ILIKE 'public%';
SELECT id, cidr FROM subnets WHERE name = 'subnet-A' AND network_id > 2;
SELECT * FROM subnets JOIN virtual_networks ON subnets.network_id = virtual_networks.id WHERE virtual_networks.name = 'main';
SELECT * FROM virtual_networks;
SELECT network_name, subnet_count FROM virtual_networks WHERE network_id = 1;
SELECT network_id, network_name, subnet_count FROM virtual_networks ORDER BY network_id DESC;
SELECT network_id, network_name, subnet_count FROM virtual_networks WHERE subnet_count > 5;
SELECT network_id, network_name, subnet_count FROM virtual_networks WHERE network_name LIKE 'Test%';
SELECT * FROM virtual_networks WHERE network_id = 1;
SELECT network_name, subnet_count FROM virtual_networks WHERE subnet_count > 5 ORDER BY network_name ASC;

SELECT v.network_name, s.subnet_name, nm.description FROM virtual_networks v JOIN subnets s ON v.network_id = s.network_id JOIN network_metadata nm ON v.network_id = nm.network_id ORDER BY v.network_name DESC;
SELECT v.network_name, COUNT(s.subnet_id) AS total_subnets FROM virtual_networks v JOIN subnets s ON v.network_id = s.network_id GROUP BY v.network_name HAVING total_subnets > 3;
SELECT v.network_name, s.subnet_count FROM virtual_networks v LEFT JOIN subnets s ON v.network_id = s.network_id WHERE s.subnet_count IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM virtual_networks;
SELECT id, name, created_at FROM virtual_networks ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM virtual_networks WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM subnets WHERE network_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM network_devices WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND device_type IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM virtual_networks WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, description FROM virtual_networks WHERE created_at < '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, device_name FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'router' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM subnets WHERE network_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' LIMIT 5;
SELECT d.id, d.device_name, l.log_message FROM network_devices d JOIN device_logs l ON d.id = l.device_id WHERE l.created_at > '2022-01-15' ORDER BY l.created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_networks;
SELECT id, name FROM subnets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT description FROM instances WHERE instance_type='small';
SELECT name, description FROM security_groups WHERE updated_at IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, rule_type FROM rules WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM virtual_networks WHERE id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT name, description FROM virtual_networks WHERE name LIKE '%example%';
SELECT id, subnet_cidr, network_id FROM subnets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, instance_type, subnet_id FROM instances WHERE instance_type = 'small' LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, description FROM security_groups WHERE description IS NOT NULL AND updated_at IS NULL;
